content.zekr: أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنْ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ 'الله لا إلـه إلا هو الحي القيوم لا تأخذه سنة ولا نوم له ما في السماوات وما في الأرض من ذا الذي يشفع عنده إلا بإذنه يعلم ما بين أيديهم وما خلفهم ولا يحيطون بشيء من علمه إلا بما شاء وسع كرسيه السماوات والأرض ولا يؤوده حفظهما وهو العلي العظيم' -آية الكرسي,البقرة ,255.
content.zekr_transliteration: A'udhu billahi minash-shaytanir-rajim. 'Allahu la ilaha illa Huwal-Hayyul-Qayyum, la ta'khudhuhu sinatun wa la nawm, lahu ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-ardh, man dhal-ladhi yashfa'u 'indahu illa bi-idhnihi, ya'lamu ma bayna aydihim wa ma khalfahum, wa la yuhituna bi shay'in min 'ilmihi illa bima sha'a, wasi'a kursiyyuhus-samawati wal-ardh, wa la ya'uduhu hifdhuhuma, wa Huwal-'Aliyyul-'Adheem.' - Ayat al-Kursi, Al-Baqarah, 255.
content.english_translation: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan. 'Allah! There is no god but He - the Living, The Self-subsisting, Eternal. No slumber can seize Him Nor sleep. His are all things In the heavens and on earth. Who is there can intercede In His presence except As he permitteth? He knoweth What (appeareth to His creatures As) Before or After Or Behind them. Nor shall they compass Aught of his knowledge Except as He willeth. His throne doth extend Over the heavens And on earth, and He feeleth No fatigue in guarding And preserving them, For He is the Most High, The Supreme (in glory).' - Verse of the Throne, Al-Baqarah, 255.
content.bless: من قالها حين يصبح أجير من الجن حتى يمسى ومن قالها حين يمسى أجير من الجن حتى يصبح.
content.bless_english_translation: Whoever says it when he enters the morning will be protected from the jinn until the evening, and whoever says it when he enters the evening will be protected from the jinn until the morning.
